name: Pigeon Vision
description:
"Journey"

Wouldn't the world be a little strange at the height of a pigeon? Especially if the world was a little stranger too.

Liminal spaces are very cool and over my travels I've discovered some strange liminal spaces that somehow manage to fit together. I thought it would be pretty entertaining to explore this kind of world at the height of something really small and then this demo was born from there!

It might also,, be a uni level design assignment but hey I sure was in the very slow turtle process of creating this very tiny demo anyways so here it is!

Attributes in read me file :)
